Articles.Content:
We all know that the sas system got updated and some people miss the old version of it.

So before .21 release i copy the ASAS module from .20 and before to a folder.The asas still have the same system before 0.21

I hope you enjoy(this is my first mod:D)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/wchzr66rww3v07d/old%20ASAS.zip

That does not do anything for the feedback system.

Its basically a part with no function at all

this is something for me.

i like the new sas features for low altitude flight with planes. but on high altitude flights i need to trim and trim and trim because the new system just wonÃ‚Â´t hold the orientation.

maybe that is because of the thin atmosphere, but in general i like the new asas system.
